Adaptive Intelligence
for robotics and
industrial control

Just as nature evolves and adapts, we believe that control systems should be always learning and adapting. To us, Al means Adaptive Intelligence. Our mission is to enable tomorrow's sustainable manufacturing and robotics through the development of revolutionary adaptive Al control systems.

From single unit processes to entire plant optimization,
we're taking care of all your control software needs

Luffy Al utilises its unique adaptive Al framework to provide software control system solutions for industrial processes and robotic systems. We work with your team to develop system models and train an adaptive Al to handle uncertainties, machine tolerances and unexpected scenarios, while simultaneously and continuously optimising for your key performance metrics.

Developed from the ground up to run in extremely compute limited environments, our Al technology runs right at the edge, eliminating the need for a cloud connection. In addition, it stays on your site and entirely within your control.

Our solutions
for industrial systems

Our solutions for robotics
and drone platforms

find out what makes us different

Our Al-based groundbreaking controllers are designed to exhibit neuroplasticity. The network's learning system is embedded within the network itself, allowing dynamic "on the job learning.
The result is exceptionally adaptive and resilient controllers, which can react and successfully adapt to real-life conditions they have never encountered before, and this with no human in the loop.

find out more

the only contant is change...

Robots and machines are continually exposed to change - internal variations such as component wear and tear, and external variations such as fluctuating environmental factors.

Conventional control systems are not equipped to deal with those variations. They are inflexible, optimised for certainty using digital models that do not transition well to real-world operating conditions. The result rarely meets the expectation: suboptimal performance, substandard quality, with a direct impact on productivity and sustainability.

Al brings unprecedented solutions to engineering problems. But Al too has limitations. Existing Al technologies struggle with the transition into physical hardware - what is known as the "reality gap". In order to deal with the uncertainty, they require huge amounts of data and computational expense.

Meet the team

We are a small team of passionate individuals, united in our commitment to build a future where smart technologies work for our planet and its people. We believe in the transformative power of adaptive intelligence to revolutionise Industry and create a safer, fairer and more sustainable society.
